response.overview: What does a Skinhead think about Sweden?  What has a Biker got in common with a radical Hiphoper?  What's the difference between an Anarchic Feminist and a Muslim girl?  Are the Nazi youngsters evil?  Death Metal, Punk, Hiphop, Oi!-music…  Abuse of Narcotics, imprisonment, Bin Ladin, USA, EU riots…  “Under the dark sky of the nation” is a present day account of a split Sweden reflected by those who society consider dangerous.
response.title: Under the dark sky of the nation
